column4: i installed ubuntu from a flash drive, and i'm dual booting with windows 7. when i boot from hdd, grub fails. when i boot from flash drive, grub runs and I can choose which OS to boot into. any idea how i can get grub to work off of hdd?
boot the os, rerun 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure grub-pc' and tell it to put grub on the HD. You can keep the flash as a backup grub emergancy booting gizmo :)
theres prob other ways to reinstall grub to the hd. but i tend to always make a flash that  boots every machine as a rescue feature.
